title: Carols by Candlelight 2015
desc: Join the Alice Martineau Appeal Committee for our 13th annual Carols by Candlelight on Thursday 17 December in?support?of the Cystic Fibrosis Trust. We hope that you will be able to come and enjoy a very special evening, filled with festive carols from the Winchester College Chapel Choir and readings from celebrity supporters including Jenny Agutter. Carol service 7-8pm at St Luke's Church, Sydney Street, London SW3 Party 8-10pm at?The Chelsea Gardener, Sydney Street with mulled wine and canap?s ? We are very grateful to? ?for generously sponsoring the event again this year. Eventbrite charges the Cystic Fibrosis Trust 7% of the ticket price. If you would like to help prevent the charity incurring these charges, tickets can also be purchased by calling our Events Team directly:? . For any enquiries please email? . Please note, online ticket sales will close at 5pm on Thursday 3 December. Any remaining tickets will be available to purchase on the door from 6:15pm. We would like to keep you updated about this event and others we think you may be interested in, if you would like to opt out of receiving emails from the Cystic Fibrosis Trust at any time, you can call 020 3795 2176.
